hero.title: Revolutionizing Urban Mobility with Adaptive Traffic Intelligence
hero.subtitle: Traffix develops AI-driven traffic light systems that adapt in real-time, reducing congestion and improving city life.

about.title: Who We Are
about.content: Traffix is a Yerevan-based startup focused on building smarter cities. Our mission is to make urban mobility seamless through AI-powered traffic management and driver engagement tools. We combine cutting-edge computer vision with machine learning to create sustainable transportation solutions.

problem.title: The Urban Traffic Challenge
problem.content: Cities worldwide lose billions of hours and dollars due to inefficient traffic systems. Fixed-timer lights don't adapt to real conditions, leading to unnecessary congestion, increased emissions, and frustrated drivers. In Armenia alone, commuters spend an average of 45 minutes more daily due to traffic inefficiencies.

solution.title: Our Intelligent Solution
solution.content: Traffix introduces an adaptive traffic management system that uses camera data and AI algorithms to optimize light durations in real-time. Our system reduces average wait times by 35% and decreases emissions by creating smoother traffic flow.

ai.title: AI-Based Optimization
ai.desc: Real-time analysis of vehicle and pedestrian density using advanced computer vision

scalable.title: Scalable Infrastructure
scalable.works: Works across intersections and entire city networks

eco.title: Eco-Friendly Impact
eco.desc: Reduces idle emissions by 40% and improves urban air quality

insights.title: Smart Insights
insights.desc: Visual dashboards and predictive analytics for city operators

app.title: Traffix Mobile App
app.content: Our companion mobile app allows drivers to view real-time traffic maps, reserve parking spaces, and even earn passive income by sharing their private parking spots. Join thousands of users already optimizing their daily commute.
